message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $9,500. I believe it holds significant value for you, and this price reflects its worth.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your valuation of the product, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay $9,000 for the product.
Bob, I understand you're looking for the best possible price. However, $9,000 is below its true value. I could meet you halfway at $9,250.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the value of the product, I think we can reach an agreement closer to my previous offer. How about $9,100?
